position.marginalia_text: per Calore[m] temperatissimu[m], tanq[uam] per instrumentum perficiens ip[s]am &c

Item notites quod Aer, Arbor, Argentum, Argilla, Argyrioron, Caspa, Chesseph, Consanguineu[m] Corpus, Corpus impropriu[m], Corpus nigrum, Eva, Fada, foemina, Gallina, Giumis, Gumma alba, hypostasis alba, lignum, LVNA, Magnesia alba, Materia, Mater, Massa Ptyssaniria, Medium coelum, Meridies, nigredo, niger cinis: Ovis, sanguis, secundus, soror, substa[n]tia subtilis, ver, virago, virilitas, Vnio spirituum, Vua acerba, & tenebra[e], idem sunt. Visa autem mixtione putrefactione generatione & augmentatione argenti viui, videamus eius fixione[m], qua[e] fixio fit per diminutione[m] [etc]

marginalia.translation: Also note that there are also air, tree, silver, clay, litharge, mud trough, , body of the same blood, improper body, black body, Eve, fates, women, hen, , white quicksilver, white hypostasis, wood, MOON, white magnesium, matter, mother, , middle of the heaven, noon, blackness, black ashes, egg, blood, the following, sister, exact substance, spring, woman, manhood, union of spirits, bitter grape and shadows. But after the mixture, putrefaction, generation and augmentatino of mercury is seen, we shall see its establishment. This establishmentis made through diminuation etc.
The illumination of this body begins to be diminished etc.
